strings.Value: "Tell me about the Order of the Rack."
"Who is this fugitive you're looking for?"
"Can I help you with your investigation?"
"I authorize you to conduct your investigation within my {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom}."
"Get out of my {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom}."
"Catching criminals is one thing, but burning books is too much!"
"Your actions in Cheliax do not concern me. But while you are on my land, I demand you to refrain from such... extreme measures."
"I entirely share your opinion."
[Remain silent]

"The {g|Order of the Rack}Order of the Rack{/g} welcomes you, {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen}." {n}The black-skinned woman slightly bows her carefully shaved head.{/n} "My name is Linxia. I come from the distant land of {g|Cheliax}Cheliax{/g} in search of a dangerous criminal who is hiding in your barony."
{n}She stands tall and almost motionless. The reflected torch light dances on the surface of her polished black armor and in the depths of her watchful black eyes.{/n}

"I am glad that we have met, and I believe the rule of law in your {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom} is not just empty phrases. I hope for the cooperation from your subjects and you personally." {n}Contrary to her words, Linxia's face does not express any gladness. The corner of her mouth twitches slightly, betraying carefully-concealed discontent.{/n}

{n}Linxia's face remains as stony as ever. Only the corner of her mouth expresses displeasure with your decision.{/n} "You misunderstand me, {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen}. The investigation will continue, with or without your permission. The {g|Order of the Rack}Order of the Rack{/g} always collects. No one should stay in its way."

"A dangerous pirate, a murderer, and a rebel named Darven "the Dashing" Fairwood. He was found guilty of inciting a rebellion and murdering a noble lord in {g|Cheliax}Cheliax{/g}. The law of my Order is unwavering. The punishment for such crimes is death."

"Darven's rebellion took place in {g|Cheliax}Cheliax{/g} three years ago. The {g|Order of the Rack}Order of the Rack{/g} quickly suppressed it, the participants were jailed, and the instigators quartered — but their leader Darven managed to escape. I have followed his trail for a long time, and now it has led me here."
{n}The shadow of a smile crosses Linxia's face.{/n} "I and my knights are perfectly capable of finding and eliminating one criminal. Your help... is unnecessary."
"If you want to help, do not interfere."
"We are the {g|Hellknights}Hellknights{/g}. We guard law and order. Legitimate authorities can rely on us entirely. Criminals tremble when they hear our footsteps."
{n}Linxia sizes you up.{/n} "It is in your best interest to maintain friendly relations with us. Trust me, {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen}."

"The Order of the Rack is a union of the knights of {g|Cheliax}Cheliax{/g}, led by hatred of idleness, worthless philosophy, and useless knowledge. Indulgence leads to lawlessness and insurrection. We seek out any manifestations of dissent and burn them — be they books, scientific treatises... or those who create them."

{n}For a moment, Linxia stares at you with an intense look, but then blinks as if suddenly relaxed.{/n} "We stand on the side of legitimate authority. You need not be afraid, {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen}."
"We do not burn all books, only those that can harm society and place dangerous thoughts in weak-willed minds. It's better to burn a book today than quarter its reader tomorrow."
"I... will try to fulfill your request." {n}She gives you a little grin.{/n} "At least — we'll let you know before we decide to burn someone."

{n}Linxia raises her eyebrow for a moment, as if she never expected such an answer.{/n} "I'm pleased to see that our judgments coincide. We will inform you if, in the process of our investigation, we stumble upon any manifestations of dissent in your {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom}."
"Thank you, {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen}. Your good will means a lot to us."
